withdrawalProcessed.title: Pending!
withdrawalProcessed.description: Your withdrawal is being processed. We will check your request in a short while.

userCanceledWithdrawal.title: Success
userCanceledWithdrawal.description: You have successfully canceled your withdrawal.

depositSuccess.title: Success
depositSuccess.description: Your {sum} deposit made on {date} is successful!

depositError.title: Error
depositError.description: Sorry, but something went wrong with your {sum} deposit from {date}. Please try again.

withdrawError.title: Canceled withdrawal
withdrawError.description: Your {sum} withdrawal from {date} is being canceled. Please, contact our Support Team for more information.

transactionSent.title: Success
transactionSent.description: The transaction has been formed. Open your web3 wallet and confirm the transaction.

transactionIsPending.title: Transaction in progress
transactionIsPending.description: You will be notified as soon as the funds arrive in your account.
